short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BluHorizon extension - analysis tool for BlueSky data
short.ko: React, Typescript, Vite를 사용한 크롬 익스텐션 보일러플레이트입니다.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BluHorizon Extension
Your All-in-One Analysis Tool for BlueSky Data

BluHorizon is the ultimate browser extension designed to elevate your BlueSky experience by providing powerful, intuitive data analysis tools and additional features at your fingertips. Whether you're an enthusiast, a researcher, or a business analyst, BluHorizon helps you gain actionable insights from BlueSky's rich data ecosystem.
